column5: Lew If there is anything you need , just say the word. There are many OFNrs out there who would be there in a second. Dave
Lew, sorry to hear about  your mom. You have my  most sincere condolences.  Take care,  Bruce
Thank you very much Dave, that's more than generous and kind of you, but Mom was an extremely well organized person and all her funeral arrangements were made and fully paid for many years ago.
Think of her often and she'll never be gone.  My condolences to you and your family, Lew.

I'm sorry to hear that Lew. My thoughts are with you.  My mom is also not well (cancer), so its only a matter of time now. It's nice to see the support from the community. Believe it or not, it sure makes a difference to know people are there to support you even if its over the internet.
Sorry to hear that. Know what its like to lose someone close to you. Condolences to you and your network of family and friends.

Lew,  I am deeply saddened for your loss. It has been a tough few years for you losing loved ones... If there is anything I can do please say the word. You already know you have a wonderful support system here on OFC and have made alot of friends along the way.... a testament to your character.  I will say a few words for you and your family tonight...  I hope you can find some peace in knowing your mother is in a better place...  You and I have experienced something not many on here have.. and it is a bitter pill to swallow..  Be well Lew, you and you're family are in my thoughts and prayers.  Gerritt.
Sorry to hear of your moms passing Lew, our thoughts and prayers are with you and your family at this time.
mothers are special..im sorry for your loss
My condolences, friend.
Sorry to hear of your loss, she must be a lovely lady, my condolences to you and your family.
Sorry bud but I just got back from a week in Florida.    My sincerest sympathies to you and your family.
My condolences Lew.  Sorry for your loss.
My condolences Lew.  Take care.
Lew I am sad to here of the news I hope you all get through this together our thoughts are heading her way.  Mike and Family
My condolences also Lew even though I have never met you we have contacted each other on several topics.  Kevin
Our condolences to you Lew and your family.  Brian and Betty.
Lew, Sorry to hear this. You have my condolences as well. Take Care, Brian
Sorry to hear of the loss of your mother Lew.   Patsy and I share our condolences to you and your family.
Lew, you are a classy guy, so you musta been raised by quality folks...Sorry for your loss.
My deepest sympathies Lew.
Sorry to hear of your loss... To loose a parent one is loseing a mentor, idol, and best freind all at once...it doesn't get much tougher then that. My condolences to you and your family Lew,
oh im so sorry to here the news about your mom!  my condolences to you and your family!
oh im so sorry to here the news about your mom!  my condolences to you and your family!
Sorry to hear Lew.
My deepest condolances, Lew.
That was a beautiful sentiment, Lew.  I'm sure we all hope to follow her example.  Deepest sympathies from Jeff & I.
Sorry to hear this news Lew.  My condolences to you and your family.
So sorry to hear about your loss Lew! our deepest sympathies to you and family.
Sorry for your loss.
Sad to hear of your loss Lew, Jackie and I send you our condolences.
sorry for your loss Lew
Thanks for all your kind thoughts folks, their certainly appreciated. I was busy getting things organized yesterday and never had a chance to get back here till this morning.
I am sorry for your loss Lew.
My sincere condolences to you and your family Lew!!

Sorry to hear your Loss.  I buried my father last Year, My Mother two years ago and Hated every second of it. Nothing like going through your Moms stuff and finding out she had filled her pension Papers a year before her 65th Birthday.  The Poor old lady was looking forward to it.  Never had time to grieve as their affairs, well weren't in order.  Both were also seperated so I had to do everything.  My Dad twice because they wouldnt bury him in Quebec till spring as he died in Feb.  Pure Hell for me.  Last week me and my wife were almost set to go back East for a second time within a year as her Mom came close.
Sorry for your loss.
Lew  You have certainly had enough tragedies in your life. Our deepest condolences to you and your family.  John and Diane Ross
Sorry to hear that Lew, my deepest condolences
My deepest condolences to you and the family Lew.
So sorry Lew.
Sorry Lew, one of the toughest parts of getting old. Condolences, to you and the family.
Gees I am sorry to hear that Lew. My condolences to you and your family.
Sorry to hear of your loss Lew.  My condolences to you and your family.
sorry for your loss lew
sorry to hear about your loss Lew, although knowing she went peacefully it is sad news to hear.  Matt!
I am saddened by your news, Lew.  Her trials are over now.
My condolences Lew to you and your family. God Bless.  Ric
my condolences Lew
very sorry to hear it Lew. Hang tight!
My condolences to you and yours Lew.
Lew, I am so sorry to here that. You and your family have my condolences......
My condolences Lew, it has been a tough time for you and your family the last while - my thoughts are with you.  Dan
My condolences Lew!  God bless  Matt
Sorry to hear that. Stay strong.   Curt
Sorry to hear that, you have my condolences. Grandmother passed in her sleep, if you're going its the best way imo.
Sorry for your loss, may you rest with many fond memories.
Our condolences to you and yours Lew.TC and tight lines...Chuck...
My deepest condolences Lew.
So sorry...thinking of you and your family.
my condolences to you and your family lew...
My condolences,Lew.  Let faith heal what time cannot...
Very sorry for you and you're families loss. My  condolences to you and your family Lew.
My sincerest condolences to you and your family Lew.
I'm sorry for your loss Lew. Sincere condolences from our family to yours.
Lew, I'm so sorry for your loss. You and your family have my deepest condolences.  Dave
My condolences to you and your family Lew. You have had a very difficult few years. HH
You have my deepest condolences. She can now have rest from her illnesses.
Sorry to hear your loss Lew, condolences to you and your family.
Lew Very Sorry to Hear that.  Just think of the Fun Times and great memories  She left you with.  Thinking of You and Yours  Rick

Lew,  I know that your Mom had been ill for some time. Non the less it is always very tough to let them go when their time has come and we can never really prepare ourselves for the inevitable.  Very sincere condolences from Barbara and me. We will hold you and your family close to our hearts.  John...
So sorry Lew, My condolences to you all.
I'm sorry Lew   My condolences to you and your family.
Very sad news Lew.  Take care of yourself and the family.  Grant
So sorry to hear this , The loss of anyone is hard ,Mothers even harder . My deepest condolences to you and  your family
Always tough when you lose a parent no matter what the circumstances...Sorry for your loss. All the best to you and your family..
My deepest condolences Lew.

We are so sorry to hear of the loss of your mom Lew...  I know from some of the pictures you have posted of her over the years, she must have been a lovely lady...  Our condolences to you and your family...  Maribeth and Beans
Very sorry to hear that Lew.  My condolences to you and your family.
Sorry to hear of the sad news Lew.... My sincere condolences to you and your family.
My condolences Lew.
Sad news indeed. My condolences Lew.

We are so sorry to hear about the loss of your mom. No one can help take away the feelings that you are going through right now... Losing a parent, an intrigal part of your everyday life, changes how the world around you works... Hopefully you will find peace in knowing that to love and be loved is one of lifes most amazing gifts...  You and your family are our my thoughts and prayers.  Always Bernadette (jen) and Steve
Very sorry to hear the news Lew. All the best to you and your family. You and your mother are in my thoughts and prayers.
My Condolences Lew
So sorry for the loss of your Mother Lew. Our thoughts are with you at this time and if you need ANYTHING... just give me a ring.  Wayne and Leah
sorry to hear that Lew,my condolences to you and yours
Very sorry to hear that Lew. My condolences to you and your family.

My dear old Mom has been very ill for several months and passed away peacefully in her sleep  last evening. She was a lovely lady who lived a very long and wonderful life and will be missed by all who knew her.
Sorry to hear that Lew  My thoughts will be with you and your family  Its always tough when a family member passes away  Take care  Dave
Lew, I'm so sorry, I only had the pleasure of meeting her once, but what a great lady she was...I know she will be missed.  Maureen
I'm sorry for your loss Lew , she sound slike she was a wonderful lady .  Dave
So sorry to hear Lew. Our condolences from our family to yours.
Very sorry to hear that Lew, my deepest condolences.
Very sorry for you and you're families loss. My condolences to you all.
Lew,  Very sorry about the news.  Losing a family member is tough, no matter how good or long the life.
My deepest condolences Lew.
Very sorry to hear of your loss Lew, our condolences to you and your family.
My condolences Lew...Our thoughts and prayers are with you and your family!  Steve
Sorry to here that Lew my condolences to you and your family
Very sorry for you and you're families loss Lew. Our condolences to you and the family.

My condolences and also J's to you Lew. Unfortunately, in the last few years, being hit from all sides, you've had it pretty hard. No one can show you how to deal with these things. Loss of one's mother is really difficult. You have a PM my friend.
Very sorry to hear of the loss of your mom Lew. My sincere condolences to you and your family.
Very sorry to hear Lew.
My deepest condolences Lew.
My prayers are with you and your family lew.   kim
sad news Lew...my condolences to you and your family.
My condolences Lew to you and your family.
Lew, please accept my sincerest condolences. I know that the loss of one's mother is not easy, perhaps you can find some comfort in knowing she had wonderful children.
sorry for your loss lew
My sincere condolences Lew.
My condolences Lew.   Cherish the memories.  Rob V
Very sad news Lew.  My condolances to you and your family.  Joey
